= Import/Export feature =

Requirements for import/export operations:
 * complete site with themes
 * one or several themes


 Complete site = content tree + content child resources

 Content child resources are placed to /page/page_path and are available as url /file/page/page_path

 Theme = theme content + theme child resources

 Theme child resources are placed to /theme/uniqe_theme_name/inside_theme_path and are available as url /file/theme/unique_theme_name/inside_theme_path


== Import/export file format ==

Zip archive with following structure:
{{{
/-
 |- content.xml
 |- theme /-
 |         |- theme_name /-
 |                        |- description.xml
 |                        |- content.html
 |                        |- any_other_theme_files_and_folders
 |
 |- page /- any_other_page_files_and_folders
}}}

content.xml
{{{
<site>
  <config>
    <google-analytics>ETF-342343</google-analytics>
    <email>support@site.com</email>
    <domain>site.com</domain>
    ... all site configs     
  </config>
  <pages>
    <page url="/" title="root" theme="simple">
      <content>root page content</content>
      <comments>
        <comment name="Andrey" publishDate="10.01.2009">
           This is my comment content
        <comment>
        <comment name="Yuri" publishDate="11.01.2009">
           This is second comment.
        <comment>
      </comments>
      <page name="about" title="About page">
        <content>about page content</content>
      </page>
      <page url="/services" title="Services page" theme="custom">
        <content>services page content</content>
      </page>
    </page>
  </pages>
</site>
}}}

description.xml
{{{
<theme>
  <title>My first theme</title>
  <url>first</url>
</theme>
}}}

any_other_files_and_folders will be places to /files/theme/theme_name
